title: 262 - Alisa Esposito (Sparkroot Farm)
description:
Alisa's path to the heart of the community at Sparkroot Farm has been winding and hilly, to say the least.  



This is a public episode. If you’d like to discuss this with other subscribers or get access to bonus episodes, visit chrisryan.substack.com/subscribe
